name: Clientes Pendientes de Facturar
query:
select 
c.name as 'cliente',
spd.service_start,
c.customer_name as  'nombre',
s.name as 'contrato',
case when (select count(*) from `tabSubscription Plan Equipos` where parent = s.name and plan = spd.name) > 0 then 'con equipo' else 'sin equipo' end as 'equipo',
spd.plan as 'plan',
sp.item_group as 'portafolio',
ad.departamento,
ad.municipio,
ad.barrio
 from `tabSubscription` s 
inner join `tabCustomer` c on s.party = c.name
inner join `tabSubscription Plan Detail` spd on spd.parent = s.name
inner join `tabSubscription Plan` sp on sp.name = spd.plan 
inner join `tabAddress` ad on ad.name = spd.direccion
where s.workflow_state = 'Instalado' and c.estado_cliente = 'ACTIVO'
and c.name not in ('CUST-910000592','CUST-910001632','CUST-910001712','CUST-910001713','CUST-910001714',
'CUST-910001715','CUST-910001716','CUST-910001717','SCI-710002504','CUST-910001711')
and s.name not in (select parent from `tabSubscription Plan Detail` where estado_Plan='Inactivo')
